verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> when he was in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> you are my God; <S%H410><s%> early <S%H7836><s%> will I seek <S%H7836><s%> you: my soul <S%H5315><s%> thirsts <S%H6770><s%> for you, my flesh <S%H1320><s%> longs <S%H3642><s%> for you in a dry <S%H6723><s%> and thirsty land, <S%H776><s%> where no <S%H1097><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> is;
To see <S%H7200><s%> your power <S%H5797><s%> and your glory, <S%H3519><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> as I have seen <S%H2372><s%> you in the sanctuary. <S%H6944><s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> life, <S%H2416><s%> my lips <S%H8193><s%> shall praise <S%H7623><s%> you.
Thus <S%H3651><s%> will I bless <S%H1288><s%> you while I live: <S%H2416><s%> I will lift <S%H5375><s%> up my hands <S%H3709><s%> in your name. <S%H8034><s%>

My soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be satisfied <S%H7646><s%> as with marrow <S%H2459><s%> and fatness; <S%H1880><s%> and my mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall praise <S%H1984><s%> you with joyful <S%H7445><s%> lips: <S%H8193><s%>
When <S%H518><s%> I remember <S%H2142><s%> you on my bed, <S%H3326><s%> and meditate <S%H1897><s%> on you in the night watches. <S%H821><s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> you have been <S%H1961><s%> my help, <S%H5833><s%> therefore in the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of your wings <S%H3671><s%> will I rejoice. <S%H7442><s%>
My soul <S%H5315><s%> follows <S%H1692><s%> hard <S%H1692><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you: your right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> upholds <S%H8551><s%> me.
But those that seek <S%H1245><s%> my soul, <S%H5315><s%> to destroy <S%H7722><s%> it, shall go <S%H935><s%> into the lower <S%H8482><s%> parts of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
They shall fall <S%H5064><s%> by the sword: <S%H2719><s%> they shall be a portion <S%H4521><s%> for foxes. <S%H7776><s%>

But the king <S%H4428><s%> shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in God; <S%H430><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> one that swears <S%H7650><s%> by him shall glory: <S%H1984><s%> but the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of them that speak <S%H1696><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%> shall be stopped. <S%H5534><s%>
